snippet: With a missile launch that defied the United States and the United Nations Security Council, North Korea’s new leader has failed his own first test.
abstract: Editorial asserts that North Korea’s new leader Kim Jong-un blew his chance to set his country on a saner, more productive path when his military tested a ballistic missile in defiance of the United States and the United Nations Security Council; notes that the rocket disintegrated soon after takeoff; urges the US and the international community to enforce existing sanctions against North Korea while keeping the lines of communication open.
lead_paragraph: With a missile launch that defied the United States and the United Nations Security Council, North Korea’s new leader has failed his own first test.
